content.subTitle: 2-step verification
content.text: Add an additional layer of security to your account during login.

content.subTitle: Delete my account
content.text: Permanently delete the account and remove access from all workspaces.

content.subTitle: Set timezone automatically using your location
content.text: Reminders, notifications, and emails are delivered based on your time zone.

content.subTitle: Cookie settings
content.text: Customize cookies. See {link to cookie notice} for details.

content.subTitle: Profile discoverability
content.text: Users with your email can see your name and profile picture when inviting you to a new workspace.

content.subTitle: Activity in your workspace
content.text: Receive emails when you get comments, mentions, page invites, reminders, access requests, and property changes.

content.subTitle: Always send email notifications
content.text: Receive emails about activity in your workspace, even when you're active on the app.

content.subTitle: Language
content.text: Change the language used in the user interface.

content.subTitle: Theme
content.text: Customize how Proquill looks on your device.
